titles: A fuller answer to Elimas the sorcerer or to the most material part (of a feign'd memoriall) toward the discovery of the Popish Plot, with modest reflections upon a pretended declaration (of the late Dutchess) for charging her religion : prelates ... in a letter addressed to Mr. Thomas Jones by Richard Watson ... / published by Monsieur Maimburg ...
author: Watson, Richard, 1612-1685.
publisher: Printed by H. Brugis for N. Wolf ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
